paragraphs.0: This page is the product of a thought â€“ how could I create a paragraph in the shape of a circle? Better yet, was there a way to create paragraphs in all kinds of shapes with a common approach?
paragraphs.1: In the following article, I'll explain one approach to creating paragraphs in all sorts of whacky shapes. Where my approach succeeded, its limitations, and where it might see some improvement. Hope you enjoy!
